Label: lower count
Text definition: A relationship between a {data item} and the inclusive lower endpoint of a non-negative integer range that contains the datum's value.

Label: upper count
Text definition: A relationship between a {data item} and the inclusive upper endpoint of a non-negative integer range that contains the datum's value.

Label: lower percent
Text definition: A relationship between a {data item} and the inclusive lower endpoint of a real number range within [0.0,100.0] that contains the datum's value.

Label: upper percent
Text definition: A relationship between a {data item} and the inclusive upper endpoint of a real number range within [0.0,100.0] that contains the datum's value.

Label: abscised
Text definition: A relationship between two plant structures {$PO:'plant structure'} p and q such that p 'abscised' q indicates that plant structure q was formerly a part of p and that q was removed from p due to some {GO:'abscission'} process.

Label: abscised from
Text definition: A relationship between two plant structures {$PO:'plant structure'} p and q such that q 'abscised from' p indicates that plant structure q was formerly a part of p and that q was removed from p due to some {GO:'abscission'} process.

Label: quality datum of
Comments: This is similar to IAO:'is quality measurement of', but the IAO property uses BFO:'quality' for its range, and we use PATO:'quality'.

Label: USA-NPN term
Text definition: The NPN phenophase name that means the same thing as the PPO phenological stage name.

Label: BBCH code
Text definition: The BBCH code that means the same thing as the PPO phenological stage name.

Label: generated from
Text definition: A relationship between one {'data item'} that is the output of a {'phenology observing process'} and another 'data item'.

Label: is or was part of
Text definition: A relationship that indicates the object was {'part of'} the subject at some point in time, but might no longer be so.
